purpose: Facilitates automated testing of web applications using AI-driven capabilities.
principle: Builds on popular web testing frameworks such as Playwright and Selenium, leveraging AI for enhanced test automation and coverage.
reusability: Offers a modular architecture with plugins for integration with existing testing pipelines and CI/CD workflows.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may include incomplete features and potential instability; limited to web applications.
name: magnitude
description: Open source, AI-native testing framework for web apps
highlight: AI-native testing framework that integrates seamlessly with popular web testing tools like Playwright and Selenium.
